body:
Comment 1: 
could you load $GOROOT/pkg/linux_arm/go_bootstrap into gdb, and run, wait
for the crash, and show me the exact instruction that it's invalid?
execute these after it crashes inside gdb:
bt
disassem

or, if you can make it dump core, you can attach the go_bootstrap and its core
(compressed) to this issue so that I can take a look.
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
